name: About Gravity
description:
You are Steven, an employee of the Secret Advanced New Technologies industry (SANT) , a cleaning man who for some reason finds himself in one of the testing rooms of one of the new weapons the company is developing during a normal working day. Using the prototype you will have to be able to pass all the tests that will be presented to you and then be able to get out of the structure and understand the reason why you found yourself in that situation. The weapon is a prototype that allows you to control gravity in the three Cartesian axes (x, y, z).

Only three levels are playable for a duration of a few minutes. The game is still in development and we are ready to receive any kind of feedback, We hope you'll enjoy it!
